TextBody:
Dear Amartur,

Thank you for contacting Netwrix Support support.

The times are automatically updated and synchronized with the NTP Server selected under "Appliance" > "Server Maintenance". See below screenshot.  When daylight saving time is implemented then the NTP server should automatically provide the correct time.



I hope this information helps, if you have any follow up questions then please do let us know.


Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com
